column.Name: ImageTACalendarID
column.lookupquery: SELECT TACalTemplateId, TACalTemplateName from pTACalTemplate WHERE Active = 1

column.Name: ImageSubFolder1
column.lookupquery: SELECT ImageType, ImageType AS ImageTypeName FROM pImageType ORDER BY ImageType

column.Name: ImageFileType
column.lookupquery: SELECT ImageFileTypeID, ImageFileType FROM pImageFileType WHERE Active=1 ORDER BY ImageFileType

column.Name: ImageSubFolder2
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM iCustom1 div INNER JOIN fnx_Permissions_GetGuidProductTypePermissions('##TEAMID##', 26) access ON access.ProductTypeId = div.CustomID AND access.PermissionRoleID > 0 WHERE Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: ImageSubFolder3
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM pSeason Where Active = 1 Order BY Custom

column.Name: ImageSubFolder4
column.lookupquery: SELECT * FROM iCustom3 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: ImageSubFolder5
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM pYear Where Active = 1 Order BY Custom

column.Name: ImageSubFolder6
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleCategoryId, StyleCategory FROM pStyleCategory WHERE Active = 1 ORDER BY StyleCategory

column.Name: ImageSubFolder7
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM iCustom5 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: ImageSubFolder8
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM iCustom8 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: ImageSubFolder9
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM xCustom8 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: ImageWorkflowTemplateID
column.lookupquery: SELECT ImageWorkflowTemplateID, ImageWorkflowTemplateName FROM pImageWorkflowTemplate WHERE Active = 1 ORDER BY ImageWorkflowTemplateName

column.Name: Unversioned
column.lookupquery: SELECT 1 as Value, 'No' as Text UNION SELECT 0 as Value, 'Yes' as Text ORDER BY Value DESC
